item.title: JQ实现侧边栏手风琴三级导航菜单Demo
item.description: 效果： html代码 <div class="dz_pro_nav"> <div class="pro_nav"> <ul class="nav"> <li> <div class="fristNav"> <a href="#" target="_blank" > <span class="DXIcon dx-icon_year dz_nav_icon pc"></span> <h2>一级菜单</h2> </a> <!--三角箭头--> <div class="nav_triangle_1 fristNav_open"></div> </div> <!-- 二级菜单 --> <ul class="sub"> <li> <div class="secoundNav" > <a href="#" target="_blank" > <div class="sub-title">二级菜单</div> </a> <!--三角箭头--> <div class="nav_triangle_1 secoundNav_open"></div> </div> <!-- 三级菜单 --> <div class="thr"> <a class="thridNav" href="#" target="_blank" > <!--三角箭头--> <div class="nav_triangle_2"></div> <div class="thr_title">三级菜单</div> </a> </div> </li> </ul> </li> </ul> </div> </div> CSS代码 .
